words.def: the present time or age
a person who tries to please someone in order to gain a personal advantage
Suffering from rot, or waterlogged.
tiny insectivorous West Indian bird having red-and-green plumage and a long straight bill
any of various tailless stout-bodied amphibians with long hind limbs for leaping
time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis
A palatal approximant.
an artifact designed to be played with
a rapid active commotion
a very small circular shape
room within a harem.
a slight amount or degree of difference
a unit of weight for wool equal to about 28 pounds
an adherent of any branch of Taoism
annual grass of Europe and North Africa
yea; yes.
academic year .
a public promotion of some product or service
a doctor's degree in optometry
an uproarious party
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
